page.title: 11CHURCHILL CLUBS
page.content: The Women's Institute of 24 members meet monthly in the Village Hall. The WI is involved in village life and helps most of the charity events. The Mother's Union, attached to the church holds monthly meetings around the village. Current projects are to provide a caravan for deprived families, and arrange for prison visitors to have a room in Oxford. The Cricket Club plays here most summer weekends, against other local teams. The Playgroup is run for local pre-school children on three mornings a week in the Village Hall. The Over Sixty Club meets fortnightly, and the members play Bingo, etc. and have the odd outing. The Wolf Cubs, for boys of 7-11, meet weekly. They take part in scouting activities.
